pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, November 27, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, November 27, 2016:

Antananarivo, Madagascar

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Her Excellency The Right Honourable Michaëlle Jean, Secretary General of La Francophonie

Closed to media.

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend Plenary Session III

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Excellency Roch Marc Christian Kaboré, President of Burkina Faso

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Closing Session of the XVI Francophonie Summit

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the final press conference of the XVI Francophonie Summit

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability

Press Conference Room, Media Centre
Antananarivo, Madagascar

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa, Canada

Note for media:

  • Closed to Media


Media appearance

12:00 p.m. ET  The Prime Minister will participate in an interview with TV5 Monde


Note: all times are local

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
